remediation: Upgrade azure-rtos/usbx to version 6.3.0 or higher.
title: Expired Pointer Dereference

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Expired Pointer Dereference due to type confusion. An attacker can cause remote code execution by exploiting the host stack and host class via ASIX, Prolific, SWAR, audio, and CDC ECM device-lined classes.

+            return(UX_INVALID_PARAMETER);
+    }
+
+    /* Do initialize.  */
+    return(_ux_device_class_video_initialize(command));
